scripts.start: watchify src/index.js -o static/bundle.js -dv -p livereactload -u react-native -x react -x react-dom -x ksana-codemirror -x codemirror
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -g [envify --NODE_ENV 'production'] -t [ babelify --presets es2015]  -u react-native -x ksana-jsonrom -x ksana-corpus -x ksana-corpus-search -x ksana-codemirror -x codemirror  -x react -x react-dom  | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 -c=dead_code,evaluate,loops,unused -m > static/bundle.js
